scripts.test: cat adapters/window.js src/base.js adapters/lang.js src/promise.js adapters/adapter.js > test/node-promise-test.js && promises-aplus-tests test/node-promise-test.js
scripts.test-compiled: grunt compile && cat adapters/window.js build/promise.js adapters/adapter.compiled.js > test/node-promise-test.js && promises-aplus-tests test/node-promise-test.js
